snippet: State Legislators are trying to chip away at Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s excellent bill that strives for equality for women in New York.
abstract: Editorial criticizes New York lawmakers for trying to chip away at Gov Andrew Cuomo's excellent 10-point bill to protect women's rights; calls on lawmakers to pass Women's Equality Act as it is.
lead_paragraph: State Legislators are trying to chip away at Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s excellent bill that strives for equality for women in New York.

headline.main: Keep the Women’s Rights Bill Intact
headline.print_headline: Keep the Women’s Rights Bill Intact
